data.title: Telugu movie website
data.meta_description: Idlebrain is a Telugu film website givings news, reviews, photos, interviews, trailers and videos

Jeevi interviews TG Vishwa Prasad

"à°°à±à°¡à± à°²à± à°à°à°à±à°à°à± 20% à°®à°¾à°¤à±à°°à°®à± à°®à°¿à°¸à±à°à°°à± à°¬à°à±à°à°¨à± à°²à± à°à°à°à±à°à°¦à°¿. I have plans to produce a film with Chiranjeevi garu. We constructed 40,000 square feet set for Raja Saab - biggest ever," says TG Vishwa Prasad about 15 August release Mr. Bachchan

Release dates of forthcoming films

August 15: Mr. Bachchan. Double iSmart, Thangalaan

August 16: AAY

August 22: Parakramam

August 23: Maruthi Nagar Subramanyam, Revu

August 29: Saripodhaa Sanivaaram

August 30: Aho Vikramarka

September 7: Lucky Bhaskar

September 13: Dhoom Dham, Uruku Patela, Utsavam

September 27: Devara

December 6: Pushpa 2

December 20: Robinhood

Christmas 2024: Game Changer

January 10: Vishwambhara

April 10: The Raja Saab

Jeevi review - Committee Kurrollu

"Committee Kurrollu is an authentic film naturally narrated by debutant director Yadhu Vamsi. Despite drawbacks, this film definitely provides nostalgic moments for kids of the '80s and '90s ," Jeevi review here

Jeevi interviews Niharika Konidela

"Committee Kurrollu story spans over 36 years in 3 phases. I don't use twitter as it's full of negativity. I use insta and i don't look at replies. My family protects me from trolls," says Niharika Konidela about 9th 2 August release Committee Kurrollu

Jeevi interviews Harish Shankar

"Honesy is also heroism. It's been a while since we saw Ravi Teja's kind of entertainment. Mr. Bachchan balances content and entertainment. UBS will give more high than Gabbar Singh," says Harish Shankar about 15 August release Mr. Bachchan

Jeevi interviews Bunny Vasu

"à°®à± à°ªà±à°à±à° à°¨à±à°ªà±à°ªà°¿ à°ªà±à°à±à°à±à°²à°¾ à°¨à°µà±à°µà°¿à°à°à°¿ à°¬à°¯à°à°à°¿ à°ªà°à°ªà°¿à°¸à±à°¤à°¾à°. #Thandel is the take off film for big budget and Pan-India space from Geetha Arts after pandemic," says Bunny Vasu about 16 August release AAY

Jeevi interviews Vijay Antony for Toofan

"Toofan is a John Wick style of cinema. I am going to produce and act in the first Pan India blockbuster for Tamil. Previz is going on," says Vijay Antony about 2 August release Toofan

Jeevi interviews Varun Sandesh & Viraaji team

"Viraaji story happens in an abandoned mental asylum. It's a thriller," say Varun Sandesh, Viva Raghav and director Adhyanth Harsha about 2 August release Viraaji

Jeevi interviews Allu Sirish & Buddy team

"Even if you replace teddy by human being, the emotions would be same," say Allu Sirish, Gayatri Bhardwaj & Sam Anton about 2 August releade BUDDY

Film with Sai Tej is an ambitious one with period backdrop and sets," says producer Chatanya Reddy about 19 July release Darling

Rakesh Mahankali interview

"I want to tell emotional stories," says producer Rakesh Mahankali whose film Dear Nanna is streaming on AHA

Some Ramblings - Dune 2

"The sands that wash it all off," writes Srinivas Kanchibhotla about Dune 2

Shouryuv post-mortems Hi Nanna film

Here is Jeevi's postmortem interview of #HiNanna with the director Shouryuv. Pls watch this interview only after watching the movie as there are spoilers discussed.

"Hi Nanna characters are of 3-dimentional"

"My next screenplay will be totally blood blood blood"

Watch video interview here

Jeevi video interviews Sandeep Reddy Vanga

Its easy to make a film in Hollywood than in India. In this exclusive interview Sandeep Reddy Vanga discusses about his 1st December release Animal, his filmmaking process and future projects. Worth a watch

Deva Katta REPUBLIC screenplay

Here is the 152-page screenplay of Deva Katta's acclaimed film Republic. Click here to read it in PDF format
